name: data-apps-template
description: A data application template with FastAPI backend and React Admin frontend for Databricks Apps

scripts.build: cd frontend/reactadmin && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd frontend/reactadmin && npm run build && cd ../.. && uv run python backend/main.py
scripts.install:all: cd frontend/reactadmin && npm install && cd ../.. && uv sync
